string.name: texto_legal
string.b: Legal Text: The preparation of this test is anonymous. This information will only be used for statistical purposes and at no time will it be associated with any data with which you can relate.

resources.string: 1. How long have you used the products / services of Aguadulce\'s Diary ?
b. Between six months and one year
c. Between one and three years
2. How did you know about Aguadulce\'s Diary website?
c. Our press and magazine products
3. Will you go back to the Aguadulce\'s website again?
4. Which device do you usually consult our electronic services?(Multiple option)
5. Would you like to hire a premium digital subscription?
b. Yes, I like to paid between 5 and 10 euros per month
c. Yes, I will paid more than 10 euros per month
6. What do you think of our subscription service in paper format?
a. I don\'t use it, it is an obsolete medium that is doomed to disappear
b. I don\'t use it, but several people close to me still use this format
c. I use it on specific occasions
d. I use it daily and it seems much better than the electronic format
7. Please, indicate your overall satisfaction with Aguadulce\'s Diary website
8. Would you recommend the services of Aguadulce\'s Diary to your family or friends?
You are too young to use our services
Possibly you were wrong. The longest person reached 146 years. D.E.P
You must select at least one option
